save(path, mode='spark')[source]

used for saving the models as a spark and onnx file

Parameters

  • path (string) – path where to save the model

  • mode (str, optional) – mode in which the model is to be saved. Defaults to ‘spark’.

Raises

Exception – mode not supported

maxaibase.model.spark.spark_classifier module

class maxaibase.model.spark.spark_classifier.SparkClassifierBaseModel[source]

Bases: SparkBaseModel

Base class for classification models, contains functions used for creating parameter grid and then optimising it to get best parameters

Args: run: accepts an active run from maxflow
